fields.name: AdditionalData
fields.description: Property bag of key value pairs for additional information.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Detailed overview of the issue and what impact the issue has on the stamp.

fields.name: HealthCheckSource
fields.description: The name of the services called for the HealthCheck (I.E. Test-AzureStack, Test-Cluster).

fields.name: Name
fields.description: Name of the individual test/rule/alert that was executed. Unique, not exposed to the customer.

fields.name: Remediation
fields.description: Set of steps that can be taken to resolve the issue found.

fields.name: Severity
fields.description: Severity of the result (Critical, Warning, Informational, Hidden). This answers how important the result is. Critical is the only update-blocking severity.

fields.name: Status
fields.description: The status of the check running (i.e. Failed, Succeeded, In Progress). This answers whether the check ran, and passed or failed.

fields.name: Tags
fields.description: Key-value pairs that allow grouping/filtering individual tests.

fields.name: TargetResourceID
fields.description: The unique identifier for the affected resource (such as a node or drive).

fields.name: TargetResourceName
fields.description: The name of the affected resource.

fields.name: Timestamp
fields.description: The Time in which the HealthCheck was called.

fields.name: Title
fields.description: User-facing name; one or more sentences indicating the direct issue.
